{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.06594v1", "title": "Machine Learning for Extrapolating No-Core Shell Model Results to
  Infinite Basis", "summary": "We utilize the machine learning to extrapolate to the infinite model space
the no-core shell model (NCSM) results for the energies and rms radii of the
6He ground state and 6Li lowest states. The extrapolated energies and rms radii
converge as the NCSM results from larger model spaces are included in the
training dataset for ensemble of artificial neural networks thus enabling an
accurate predictions for these observables.", "main_category": "nucl-th", "categories": "nucl-th", "published": "2025-04-09T05:42:41Z"}
